metadata.description: Current active configuration: 2x normal rate for late returns, 15-minute grace period, max NPR 1,000/day
examples: Hourly rental at NPR 2/minute becomes NPR 4/minute when late
15-minute grace period - first 15 minutes late are free
Maximum charge of NPR 1,000 even if very late

metadata.description: Example alternative: Fixed NPR 50 per overdue hour, 30-minute grace period
examples: All rentals charge NPR 50 for each hour late (same for cheap and expensive packages)
30-minute grace period - first 30 minutes late are free
Maximum charge of NPR 300/day for fairness
metadata.use_case: When you want predictable, fair charges regardless of rental cost

metadata.description: Example for busy periods: 3x normal rate, no grace period, higher daily cap
examples: Hourly rental at NPR 2/minute becomes NPR 6/minute when late
No grace period - charges start immediately
Higher cap of NPR 2,000/day for busy peak seasons
metadata.use_case: When demand is high and you want to discourage lateness strongly
